overview: Meet Buzz Stretch and Ranger! These Tremendous Tools all have one thing in common they know how to work hard and get the job done!There s so much work to be done down on the farm you need a barnyard brigade! Allis Tractor Polly the Plow and Haybine team up to make hay while Stretch works his magic keeping hay dry. Meanwhile Mighty Machines are buzzing about the sawmill where Jaws the front-end loader shows how trees are turned into lumber. Jaws may do the heavy lifting but he gets by with a little help from his friends.
title: Mighty Machines - Tremendous Tools
